mapper.insert: insert into Weather (country, name, localtimeC, observation_time, temperature, wind_speed, wind_dir, precip, humidity) values (#{location.country},#{location.name},#{location.localtimeC},#{current.observation_time},#{current.temperature}, #{current.wind_speed},#{current.wind_dir},#{current.precip},#{current.humidity})

insert into weatherEmp (nDIEmp, country, name, localtimeC, observation_time, temperature, wind_speed, wind_dir, precip, humidity) values (#{nDIEmp},#{country},#{name},#{localtimeC},#{observation_time},#{temperature}, #{wind_speed},#{wind_dir},#{precip},#{humidity})
